name: sge0nemnf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf), wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

cumulated.origin:

-| wi(wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(cfv(csumge0, c0), cmnf))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

comment: The generalized sum of nonnegative extended reals is not minus infinity. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
